languages.text: Горло и язык саднят от чудовищного непроходящего жара — вам невероятно сложно сосредоточиться на чем-то еще.
Your throat and tongue are smarting from the terrible and relentless heat, making it incredibly difficult to focus on anything else.
languages.original_text: Горло и язык саднят от чудовищного непроходящего жара — вам невероятно сложно сосредоточиться на чем-то еще.

traits.locale_text: Your throat and tongue are smarting from the terrible and relentless heat, making it incredibly hard to focus on anything else.

Your throat and tongue are smarting from the terrible and relentless heat, making it incredibly difficult to focus on anything else.
Your throat and tongue are smarting from the terrible and relentless heat, making it incredibly difficult to focus on anything else.

languages.text: 喉と舌がひどく容赦のない熱さにひりつき、他のことに集中するのが非常に困難になっている。
languages.original_text: Your throat and tongue are smarting from the terrible and relentless heat, making it incredibly difficult to focus on anything else.

traits.locale_text: 喉と舌がひどく容赦のない熱さにひりつき、他のことに集中するのが非常に困難になっている。

languages.text: Boğazın ve dilin, amansız ve dinmek bilmeyen bir hararetle cayır cayır yanıyor. Başka bir şeye odaklanmakta güçlük çekiyorsun.
languages.original_text: Your throat and tongue are smarting from the terrible and relentless heat, making it incredibly difficult to focus on anything else.

traits.locale_text: Boğazın ve dilin, o amansız ve dinmek bilmeyen hararetle cayır cayır yanıyor; başka bir şeye odaklanmakta güçlük çekiyorsun.

languages.text: El calor insufrible e implacable asola tu garganta y tu lengua, impidiéndote concentrarte en ninguna otra cosa.
languages.original_text: Your throat and tongue are smarting from the terrible and relentless heat, making it incredibly difficult to focus on anything else.

traits.locale_text: El calor insufrible e implacable asola tu garganta y tu lengua, impidiéndote concentrarte en ninguna otra cosa.

languages.text: 无情的高温灼烧着你的喉咙和舌头，让你很难把注意力集中在其他事情上。
languages.original_text: Your throat and tongue are smarting from the terrible and relentless heat, making it incredibly difficult to focus on anything else.

traits.locale_text: 无情的高温灼烧着你的喉咙和舌头，让你很难把注意力集中在其他事情上。

languages.text: Le feu des épices extra-fortes vous brûle le gosier et la langue, de telle sorte que vous avez le plus grand mal à vous concentrer sur quoi que ce soit d'autre.
languages.original_text: Your throat and tongue are smarting from the terrible and relentless heat, making it incredibly difficult to focus on anything else.

traits.locale_text: Le feu des épices extra-fortes vous brûle le gosier et la langue, de telle sorte que vous avez le plus grand mal à vous concentrer sur quoi que ce soit d'autre.

languages.text: Deine Kehle und deine Zunge schmerzen angesichts der enormen Hitze, wodurch es dir unglaublich schwerfällt, dich auf etwas anderes zu konzentrieren.
languages.original_text: Your throat and tongue are smarting from the terrible and relentless heat, making it incredibly difficult to focus on anything else.

traits.locale_text: Deine Kehle und deine Zunge schmerzen angesichts der enormen Hitze, wodurch es dir unglaublich schwerfällt, dich auf etwas anderes zu konzentrieren.
